/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; import Web3 from "web3"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, FormGroup, Input } from "reactstrap"; let web3 = ""; class Dashboard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", web3Available: "false", coinbase: "", balance: "0,00" }; } componentDidMount() { if (window.ethereum) { web3 = new Web3(window.ethereum); try { window.ethereum.enable().then(console.log("web3 enabled")), this.setState({web3Available: "true"}) } catch(e) { console.log("web3 blocked") } } // Legacy DApp Browsers else if (window.web3) { web3 = new Web3(window.web3.currentProvider); this.setState({web3Available: "true"}); } // Non-DApp Browsers else { alert('Please install MetaMask !'); } if (web3Available == "true") { //Get coinbase and ETH balance web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => this.setState({coinbase: result}) ) web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => //this.setState({coinbase: result}), web3.eth.getBalance(result).then( result => (this.setState({balance: (result/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})})) )) } } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { console.log(this.state.coinbase); console.log(this.state.balance); return ( <>
Balance USD
{" "} {this.state.balance}
Balance LUSD: 0,00
Balance EURO
{" "} 0,00
Balance LEURO: 0,00
Balance GOLD
{" "} 0,00
Balance LGOLD: 0,00
Transfer
{" "} USD Receiver amount
); } } export default Dashboard;
